participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: An introverted soul who enjoys cozy nights at home and cherishes her pets.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: A passionate cook and family man who enjoys sharing meals with loved ones.
participant_2.background: i own a house in florida. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i have a children and a dogs. i'm a male.

content.text: Hey! Are you a party animal? Because I am.
Oh, not really. I like to spend time at home
I like to cook, but I love to cook
What dishes do you like to cook?
I like to cook. I like to cook.
Okay. Its really cool/ Do you have some other hobbies?
I like to cook. I like to cook.
I like to cook too. What do you do in your free time?
I like to cook. I love to cook.ðŸ˜€
